description:
The full might of the Big Mom Pirates proves too much for the Straw Hats and Germa 66. With no other options, they decide to turn and fight, even though it means their total annihilation! But the mysterious Tamate Box comes in to play and shakes up the playing field - literally!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Hinrichtung beginnt – Ruffys Verbündete geben sich geschlagen?
L`exécution commence. les forces alliées de Luffy sont anéanties !
The Execution Begins! Luffy`s Allied Forces Are Annihilated?!
処刑開始 ルフィ連合軍全滅!?
